Question.Subject: wireless internet access?
Question.Content: Like the verison where you get a contract for your internet and plug it into a usb port. Is there a place to get one prepay or by the month with no contract?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Yes, absolutely! You can get 3G technology which is quite fast. I use it as my ONLY Internet connection at home. Here's a free resource to compare plans:
www.prepaid-wireless-guide.com/prepaid-wireless-broadband-plans.html

Answer.Content:
Hi,
yes, you can get pre-paid internet dongles from phone shops. not the best internet but is ok of quality for money.
thanks

Yes, absolutely! You can get 3G technology which is quite fast. I use it as my ONLY Internet connection at home. Here's a free resource to compare plans:
